passwordLessIntro: Naharay fangatahana avy amin’ity adiresy email ity izahay mba hidirana amin’ny Congregation Program for Everyone. Raha maniry hiditra amin’ny kaontinao {{ email }} ianao, dia sokafy ity rohy manaraka ity.
passwordLessIgnore: Tsy misy olana raha toa ka tsy nangataka an’ity rohy ity ianao.
passwordLessLinkFull: Raha misy olana ka tsy mandeha ny rohy eo ambony, dia ampiasao indray ity rohy manaraka ity. Ataovy azo antoka tsara hoe tsy misy tapaka ny soratra rehetra amin’ilay rohy.
emailOTPCodeSubject: Verification Code for for sign in to CPE app
emailOTPCodeTemplate:
Hello

Please make sure you never share this code with anyone.
Note: The code will expire in 5 minutes.
